title: [LFT] Bronze/Silver/Gold ranked team.
body:
Gold 2, was plat but went afk for a while. 

I main JG/SUP/TOP. I can play a mean Shen top

replies.body:
hey mate we need a top so if u r interested come add my ign tsm wildturtle and check out our team
we have a plat 1 jg, adc/mid s1 , and a s1 supp we need top laner

Add me for a few trial games for our new clan CrystalDivision CDVN
My IGN is Jordi Himself
:)
